backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence listing resume-import related features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring metadata, fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component wiring navigation, dialogs, and all portfolio sections using content overrides.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: Renders the About section with a title and multiple paragraphs from content data.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Contact section with email link and a validated contact form handling success and error states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Experi: Timeline-style experience and education section rendering items with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/FillMy: Dialog for editing portfolio details, validating fields, and generating patches from resume text.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer displaying social links, action buttons, and attribution with dynamic icons.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Hero section rendering avatar, name, role, bio, and CTA buttons with smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Projects grid showing project cards with thumbnails, descriptions, tech badges, and external links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Reques: Dialog allowing users to select a section, describe requested edits, and send them via email.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Skills section grouping skill categories and listing skills with badges.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/TopNav: Responsive top navigation bar with smooth-scrolling links and buttons for filling details or requesting changes.
frontend/src/content/portfolioContent.ts: Defines the PortfolioContent schema and provides default portfolio data including hero, about, skills, projects, experience, contact, and footer sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioContentOv: Manages localStorage overrides for portfolio content with validation, saving, clearing, and fallback to defaults.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables, base styles, and accessibility-focused focus rules.
frontend/src/lib/resume/applyPortfolioPa: Merges a partial portfolio patch into existing content, applying only valid, non-empty fields and merging social links safely.
frontend/src/lib/resume/parseResumeToPor: Parses resume text into a structured portfolio patch by extracting name, role, bio, skills, experience, projects, and social links.
frontend/src/lib/resume/summarizePortfol: Generates a summary of changes detected in a portfolio content patch by counting valid fields in each section.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, schema version, features, and metadata for a personal portfolio build.
